hooks.command: if [[ "{{file}}" =~ \.(env|key|pem)$ ]] || [[ "{{file}}" == */.env.* ]]; then echo '⚠️  Attempting to edit sensitive file. Please confirm.' && exit 1; fi
if [[ "{{file}}" =~ \.(ts|tsx|js|jsx|css|astro|json|md)$ ]]; then npx prettier --write "{{file}}" 2>/dev/null || true; fi
if [[ "{{file}}" =~ \.astro$ ]]; then npm run check 2>/dev/null || true; fi
